fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot a target during the day or night. (3 uses)
- Look into the eyes of a dead player each night to uncover their killer or cause of death.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may talk with the people you kill and dead players whose causes of death you have discovered.
- You have a special bond with the dead, allowing you to hear their whispers and gain intel about the living.
- Your bullet is imbued with a silver spell that can penetrate through any shield or defense, ignoring all protection and evasion abilities.
- You have a sixth sense that alerts you to the presence of any dark forces in the game, revealing any evil-aligned players in your investigative results.
- You are immune to any harmful effects from evil players and cannot be controlled or manipulated by them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Help your fellow townspeople eliminate the evil forces that threaten the town.
